text: Welcome {name} to {company_name} Education Services. You have successfully enrolled in text message notifications.

email.subject: New course assignment
email.body:
Hey {name},

You have been assigned as an instructor to the {course_name} course, with the first class starting at {first_class_dtm}. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions.

Learning Management System Login: {company_url}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
